sentences.en: "I might have known it!" Miss Burnett said with emphasis.
sentences.cn: “我早该料到了！”伯内特小姐加重语气说。

sentences.en: a change of emphasis in government policy
Emphasis was placed on the school as a transmitter of moral values.
sentences.cn: 人们强调学校为道德价值观的传输者。

sentences.en: His voice was angry and he spaced the words for emphasis.
sentences.cn: 他的声音里透着愤怒，为了强调，他一字一顿。

sentences.en: Morality was the emphasis of his speech.
Officials fear that he might interpret the emphasis on diplomacy as a sign of weakness.
sentences.cn: 官员们担心他会把对外交的重视理解为软弱的表现。

sentences.en: Other projects came up and the emphasis of my work altered.
sentences.cn: 突然来了一些其他的项目，我的工作重点便转移了。

sentences.en: She lays a lot of emphasis on the usage of prepositions.
sentences.cn: 她把重点放在介词的使用上.

sentences.en: That school puts particular emphasis on arithmetic and reading.
sentences.cn: 那所学校侧重算术和阅读.

sentences.en: The emphasis has shifted markedly in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年重点已经明显改变了.

sentences.en: The emphasis is on developing fitness through exercises and training.
sentences.cn: 重点在于通过锻炼促进健康。

sentences.en: The main emphasis of our research has shifted to the prevention of infection and septicemia.
sentences.cn: 我们研究的重点转到预防感染和败血病方面来.

sentences.en: The needs of children may not be best met by an over-emphasis on subject specialism.
sentences.cn: 过分强调学科的专业化也许并不能最好地满足儿童的需要。

sentences.en: The new breed of walking holidays puts the emphasis on enjoyment, not endurance.
sentences.cn: 这种新型的徒步旅行假日重在愉悦身心，而不是为了锻炼耐力。

sentences.en: Their language is particularly difficult to learn because of its subtle shading of tone and emphasis.
sentences.cn: 他们的语言因为音调和重音上的细微变化而特别难学。

sentences.en: They will also force schools to put more emphasis on teaching basic subjects.
sentences.cn: 他们也会迫使学校更加注重基础科目的教学。
